title: Mon Jaai
overview: The film revolves around the lives of four unemployed educated youths from lower-middle-class families of Tinsukia, Assam who are entangled by their own misfortunes. Set amidst a period of extremist uprisings, frequent bombings, corruption, and socio-political unrest, the movie tries to explore the struggles and aspirations of the helpless youth in a small town trying to meet ends, while facing the burden of responsibilities.
